triples.name: Prosocial behavior
triples.relevance: The paper reviews and analyzes existing definitions of prosocial behavior, which is the central concept of the review.

triples.name: Altruism
triples.relevance: The paper discusses altruism as a related concept to prosocial behavior and examines how researchers define the distinction between the two.

triples.name: Costâ€“benefit analysis
triples.relevance: The paper identifies costs and benefits as a key dimension that differs among definitions of prosocial behavior.

triples.name: Intention
triples.relevance: The paper examines how different definitions of prosocial behavior emphasize or de-emphasize the role of intentions and motives.

triples.name: Social environment
triples.relevance: The paper highlights societal context as a dimension along which definitions of prosocial behavior differ.
